ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, inflicting <@ba.vup>-{move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed to enemies in Attack Range. Applies 1 stack of the effect of the first talent to nearby enemies if they defeated

Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attack interval <@ba.vup>reduced</>.Reduce accuracy of ground enemies in Attack Range by <@ba.vup>{attack@damage_hitrate_physical:0%}</>. Increase taunt level and restores {attack@hp_ratio:0%} of Max HP after enemies attack miss or Ascalon Dodge
